title: Amir expresses grief over death of Ayaz’s elder sister
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 8 (APP):Federal Minister for Kashmir Affairs & Gilgit-Baltistan and SAFRON, Engr Amir Muqam on Sunday expressed profound grief and sorrow over the death of the elder sister of Speaker of National Assembly Sardar Ayaz Sadiq.
In a statement, the minister prayed that Allah Almighty grant the deceased a high position in heaven (Janna).
He said that Almighty give Sardar Ayaz Sadiq’s family the strength to bear this loss with fortitude.
